reviewText: Great! Shows our clients how the horse moves and they can see how beautiful they are.  Clients are at a therapeutic ranch and have intellectual and physical disabilities.
Great DVD!  Easy to understand.  A must for anyone who wants to know what is going on inside the horse as they move.
Great format to use to educate youth and adults.  We used for a 4-H equine educational program and it was a big hit.
I was disappointed only because I thought I was ordering the horse itself. The video is a little in depth for the age child I was purchasing for
Susan Harris should do lots more videos.  She has great information, great graphics.  This is an amazing tape for learning and for teaching.  Every rider and horseperson should have a copy.

this is an amazing cd that could help a veterinarian student or anyone wanting to learn more about horses.  totally amazing to see the horse in motion with the skeleton and muscles all working.  a must see!!!
